questions.question:
In the following questions, you are given a figure (X) followed by four alternative figures (a), (b), (c) and (d) such that figure (X) is embedded in only one of them. Trace out the alternative figure which contains fig. (X) as its part.

निम्नलिखित प्रश्न में आपको एक आकृति (X) दी गई है जिसके बाद चार एकांतर आकृतियां (a), (b), (c) और (d) दी गई हैं, इस प्रकार कि उनमें से केवल एक में आकृति (X) अंतर्निहित हो। उस एकांतर आकृति का पता लगाइए जिसमें आकृति (X) उसके भाग के रूप में है।

Find the value of 'p' for which 6x4 + 17x3 + px2 - 53x - 14 is completely divisible by (x + 1).

'p' का वह मान ज्ञात कीजिए जिसके लिए 6x4 + 17x3 + px2 - 53x - 14, (x + 1) से पूर्णतः विभाजित है।

Directions [Set of 3 Questions]: Read the data carefully and answer the following

questions.

निर्देश [3 प्रश्नों का समूह]: आंकड़ों को ध्यान से अध्ययन कीजिये और निम्नलिखित प्रश्नों के उत्तर दीजिये।


Child population of city P is equal to the sum of female population of which two cities?

शहर P की बच्चों की जनसंख्या किन दो शहरों की महिला जनसंख्या के योग के बराबर है?
options: P and RP और R
R and SR और S
Q and SQ और S
P and QP और Q
questions.answer: R and SR और S
questions.solution:
Child population of city P = 40

Option (a): sum of female population of cities P and R = 32 + 16 = 48

Option (b): Sum of female population of cities R and S = 16 + 24 = 40

Option (c): Sum of female population of cities Q and S = 44 + 24 = 68

Option (d): Sum of female population of cities P and Q = 32 + 44 = 76

Hence, option (b) is correct.

questions.question:
Directions [Set of 3 Questions]: Read the data carefully and answer the following

questions.

निर्देश [3 प्रश्नों का समूह]: आंकड़ों को ध्यान से अध्ययन कीजिये और निम्नलिखित प्रश्नों के उत्तर दीजिये।


Sum of female population of cities Q and S is equal to the sum of male population of which cities?

शहरों Q और S की महिला जनसंख्या का योग किन शहरों की पुरुष जनसंख्या के योग के बराबर है?
options: P and SP और S
Q, R, and SQ, R,और S
P, Q, and RP, Q, और R
R and SR और S
questions.answer: P, Q, and RP, Q, और R
questions.solution:
Sum of female population of cities Q and S = 44 + 24 = 68

Option (a): Sum of male population of cities P and S = 16 + 48 = 64

Option (b): Sum of male population of cities Q, R and S = 20 + 32 + 48 = 100

Option (c): Sum of male population of cities P, Q, and R = 16 + 20 + 32 = 68

Option (d): Sum of male population of cities R and S = 32 + 48 = 80

Hence, option (c) is correct.

questions.question:
Directions [Set of 3 Questions]: Read the data carefully and answer the following

questions.

निर्देश [3 प्रश्नों का समूह]: आंकड़ों को ध्यान से अध्ययन कीजिये और निम्नलिखित प्रश्नों के उत्तर दीजिये।


In which of the following pair of cities, difference between male population is minimum?

निम्नलिखित में से किस शहर युग्म में पुरुष जनसंख्या के बीच अंतर न्यूनतम है?
options: P and QP और Q
P and SP और S
R and SR और S
Q and RQ और R
questions.answer: P and QP और Q
questions.solution:
Difference between male population of P and Q = 20 - 16 = 4

Difference between male population of P and S = 48 - 16 = 32

Difference between male population of R and S = 48 - 32 = 16

Difference between male population of Q and R = 32 - 20 = 12

Hence, option (a) is correct.

questions.question:
In the question given below, three statements are given followed by two conclusions. You have to take the given statements to be true even if they seem to be at variance from commonly known facts. Read the conclusions and decide which of the given conclusions logically follows from the given statements disregarding the commonly known facts.

Statements:

All surgeries are successful.

Some critical are surgeries.

No successful is danger.

Conclusion:

I. All successful which are critical will necessarily be surgeries.

II. All surgeries are danger.

नीचे दिए गए प्रत्येक प्रश्न में तीन कथन दिए गए हैं जिनका अनुसरण दो निष्कर्ष करते हैं। दिए गए कथन को सत्य मानना है, भले ही वे सर्वज्ञात तथ्यों से भिन्न प्रतीत हों। सभी निष्कर्षों का अध्ययन कीजिए और सामान्य ज्ञात तथ्यों की अवहेलना करते हुए निर्धारित कीजिए कि कौन-सा कथन निष्कर्ष के अनुसार तार्किक रूप से अनुसरण करता है।

कथन:

सभी surgeries, successful है।

कुछ critical, surgeries है।

कोई भी successful, danger नहीं है।

निष्कर्ष:

I. सभी successful जो महत्वपूर्ण हैं,अनिवार्य रूप से surgeries होगी।

II. सभी surgeries, danger है।
options: All followsसभी अनुसरण करते हैं।
Only I followकेवल I अनुसरण करता है।
Only II followकेवल II अनुसरण करता है।
None followsकोई भी अनुसरण नहीं करता है।
questions.answer: None followsकोई भी अनुसरण नहीं करता है।
questions.solution:
All successful which are critical will necessarily be surgeries. So, statement I is false.

All surgeries are not danger. This statement is false.

questions.question:
Where was the 6th meeting of Agriculture Ministers of the member countries of Shanghai Cooperation Organization held?

शंघाई सहयोग संगठन के सदस्य देशों के कृषि मंत्रियों की छठी बैठक कहां आयोजित हुई है??
questions.solution: Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Minister, Narendra Singh Tomar addressed the 6th meeting of Agriculture Ministers of the member countries of Shanghai Cooperation Organization . The Minister in the meeting organized virtually in Dushanbe, Tajikistan stated that the agriculture sector in India performed well. Exports have also registered significant growth, contributing to global food security

questions.question:
Study the following information carefully and answer the related question.

The following bar graph represents vanilla and chocolate cakes sold from four different bakeries.

The number of vanilla and chocolate cakes together sold from bakery D is approximately what percent of the number of vanilla cakes sold from stores B and C together?

निम्नलिखित जानकारी का ध्यानपूर्वक अध्ययन कीजिये और संबंधित प्रश्न का उत्तर दीजिये।

निम्नलिखित दंड आरेख चार अलग-अलग बेकरियों से बेचे जाने वाले वेनिला और चॉकलेट केक को दर्शाता है।

बेकरी D से एक साथ बेचे गए वेनिला और चॉकलेट केक की संख्या, एक साथ स्टोर B और C से बेचे गए वेनिला केक की संख्या का अनुमानित कितना प्रतिशत है?
questions.solution:
Number of vanilla and chocolate cakes together sold from bakery D = 72 + 78 = 150

And, number of vanilla cakes sold from store B and C together = 91 + 65 = 156

Therefore, required percentage = (150/156) * 100 = 96% (approx.)

questions.question:
_________________ is the state aquatic animal of Punjab.

_________, पंजाब का राजकीय जलीय जंतु है।
options: Indus river Dolphinसिंधु नदी डॉल्फिन
questions.answer: Indus river Dolphinसिंधु नदी डॉल्फिन
questions.solution:
Indus river dolphins - one of the world’s rarest mammals, is the state aquatic animal of Punjab.

The Indus river dolphin is the second most endangered freshwater river dolphin. At present, there are only around 1,800 of these in the Indus in Pakistan.

Their population in the Beas river is between 8-10.

questions.question:
Find three consecutive positive integers such that the square of their sum exceeds the sum of their squares by 292.

तीन क्रमागत धनात्मक पूर्णांक इस प्रकार ज्ञात कीजिए कि उनके योगफल का वर्ग उनके वर्गों के योगफल से 292 अधिक हो जाए।
questions.solution:
Let n, n+1, n+2 be three consecutive positive integers.

(n+n+1+n+2)² - [n²+(n+1)²+(n+2)²] = 292

So, the required integers are 6, 7, 8.

questions.question:
Which of the following style of painting is originated in the state of Maharashtra?

चित्रकला की निम्नलिखित में से किस शैली की उद्गम महाराष्ट्र राज्य में हुआ है?
questions.solution:
Maharashtra is known for its Warli folk paintings.

Warli is the name of the largest tribe found on the northern outskirts of Mumbai, in Western India.

Warli tribesmen shun all influences of modern urbanization. Warli Art was first discovered in the early seventies. While there are no records of the exact origins of this art, its roots may be traced to as early as the 10th century A.D.

questions.question:
Find the minimum number of straight lines required to make the given figure.

दी गई आकृति को बनाने के लिए आवश्यक न्यूनतम सीधी रेखाएं ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.solution: The minimum straight lines required are AN, AR, DR, DG, GI, IM, ML, LW, WE, EM, VG, FR, MW, LT, HN, MK, i.e., 16 straight lines.

questions.question:
Which of the following is a ball game from Assam state that played between two teams during the festival of Bihu?

निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा असम राज्य का गेंद का खेल है, जो बिहू के त्योहार के दौरान दो दलों के बीच खेला जाता है?
questions.solution:
· Pallanguzhi is a Tamil traditional indoor board game, played by two players on a rectangular board. The traditional ancient game is very popular among the kids and old people especially in Tamil Nadu, Karnataka (Ali Guli Mane), Andhra Pradesh and Kerala also played in Sri Lanka.

· Dhopkhel is a ball game from Assam state played between two teams during the festival of Bihu. The indigenous game of Assam is a seasonal game that requires speed, stamina, and acrobatic skills.

· Yubi lakpi game played in Manipur with coconut and a lesser known traditional football game of India. The game generally played barefoot with 7 players in each two team over a 45 metres long pitch and also known as coconut snatching.

· Insuknawr game is a rod pushing sport played in Mizoram state of North-East India and most popular among the Mizo community. The game where round wooden rod or bamboo rod between two players are tries to push his opponent out of the ring.

questions.question:
Which of the following is the smallest tiger reserve in India?

निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा भारत का सबसे छोटा बाघ रिज़र्व है?

questions.answer: Bor Tiger Reserve, Maharashtraबोर टाइगर रिजर्व, महाराष्ट्र

questions.question:
Which of the following awards was renamed by the central government after hockey legend Major Dhyan Chand?

हॉकी के दिग्गज मेजर ध्यानचंद के नाम पर केन्द्र सरकार द्वारा निम्नलिखित में से किस पुरस्कार का नाम बदल दिया गया था?
options: Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Awardराजीव गांधी खेल रत्न पुरस्कार
questions.answer: Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Awardराजीव गांधी खेल रत्न पुरस्कार
questions.solution: Government has renamed the Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna Award, the country's highest sporting honour, after hockey wizard Major Dhyan Chand. The Prime Minister said the "exceptional performance" of the men and women hockey teams in the Tokyo Olympics will rekindle interest in the game across India.

questions.question:
Halley's Comet, is the only known short-period comet that is regularly visible to the naked eye from Earth. It last appeared in which year?

हैली धूमकेतु एकमात्र ज्ञात अल्पावधिक धूमकेतु है, जो नियमित रूप से पृथ्वी से नग्न आंखों को दिखाई देता है। यह आखिरी बार किस वर्ष दिखाई दिया था?
questions.solution: Halley's Comet or Comet Halley, officially designated 1P/Halley, is a short-period comet visible from Earth every 74–79 years. Halley is the only known short-period comet that is regularly visible to the naked eye from Earth, and the only naked-eye comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime. Halley last appeared in the inner parts of the Solar System in 1986 and will next appear in mid-2061.

questions.question:
RGFSKTIFNEWHCITNWNCOFTSRSFT

Refer the series given above and find out the missing term.

GSK, INE, HIT, WCO, ?

RGFSKTIFNEWHCITNWNCOFTSRSFT

उपर्युक्त दी गई शृंखला को देखकर लुप्त पद ज्ञात कीजिए।

GSK, INE, HIT, WCO, ?
questions.solution:
There is a gap of 1 letter between first and 2nd letter. Third letter is immediately after the second letter.

The next set of 3 letters starts after the gap of 1 letter.

So, "TRS" is the next term.

questions.question:

TJ, SF, QR, AF, ?

ATKJGASDFKJQERGHAAFGJONSR

TJ, SF, QR, AF, ?
questions.solution:
J is the 2nd next letter after T.

S is the 3rd next letter after J.

F is the 2nd next letter after S.

Continuing the trend, option b is the correct answer.

questions.question:
Study the given pattern carefully and select the number that can replace the question mark (?) in it.

17 (112) 11; 7 (104) 19; 8 (124) ?

दिए गए क्रम का ध्यानपूर्वक अध्ययन कीजिये और उस संख्या का चयन कीजिये जो उसमें प्रश्न चिह्न (?) को प्रतिस्थापित कर सके।

17 (112) 11; 7 (104) 19; 8 (124) ?

Barkha took a loan of Rs.32000 for 2 years at 15% annual Simple Interest and 75% of loan amount she invested in a scheme for 2 years at 25% annual Compound Interest.

Given below are the steps involved. Arrange them in the sequential order.

A) Loan amount = Rs.32000

B) Total interest amount received for investment = 24000 * [(1.25)2 - 1] = Rs.13500

C) Total interest given for loan = (32000 * 15 * 2)/100 = Rs.9600

D) Total earning of Barkha = 13500 - 9600 = Rs.3900

E) Invested amount = 75% of 32000 = Rs.24000

बरखा ने 2 वर्ष के लिए 15% की वार्षिक ब्याज पर 32,000 रुपये का ऋण लिया और ऋण की धनराशि का 75% उसने 25% वार्षिक चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज की दर पर 2 वर्षों के लिए एक योजना में निवेश किया।

नीचे दिए गए चरण शामिल हैं। उन्हें क्रमानुसार व्यवस्थित कीजिए।

A) ऋण की धनराशि = 32,000 रुपये

B) निवेश के लिए प्राप्त कुल ब्याज धनराशि= 24,000 * [(1.25)2 - 1] = 13,500 रुपये

C) ऋण के लिए दिया गया कुल ब्याज = (32,000 * 15 * 2)/100 = 9600 रुपये

D) बरखा की कुल कमाई = 13,500 - 9600 = 3900 रुपये

E) निवेश की गई धनराशि = 32,000 का 75% = 24,000 रुपये
questions.solution:
A) Loan amount = Rs.32000

C) Total interest given for loan = (32000 * 15 * 2)/100 = Rs.9600

E) Invested amount = 75% of 32000 = Rs.24000

B) Total interest amount received on investment = 24000 * [(1.25)2 - 1] = Rs.13500

D) Total earning of Barkha = 13500 - 9600 = Rs.3900

questions.question:
The greatest among (√19 - √17), (√13 - √11), (√7 - √5) and (√5 - √3) is:

(√19 - 17), (√13 - √11), (√7 - √5) और (√5 - √3) में सबसे बड़ा अन्तर कितना है :

The International Date Line, established in 1884, passes through the mid-Pacific Ocean and roughly follows a __________ longitude north-south line on the Earth.

वर्ष 1884 में स्थापित अन्तरराष्ट्रीय तिथि रेखा, मध्य-प्रशांत महासागर से होकर गुजरती है और पृथ्वी पर मुख्यतः __________ देशांतर उत्तर-दक्षिण रेखा का अनुसरण करती है।
questions.solution: The International Date Line, established in 1884, passes through the mid-Pacific Ocean and roughly follows a 180 degrees longitude north-south line on the Earth. It is located halfway round the world from the prime meridian - the zero degrees longitude established in Greenwich, England, in 1852. Despite its name, the International Date Line has no legal international status and countries are free to choose the dates that they observe. While the date line generally runs north to south from pole to pole, it zigzags around political borders such as eastern Russia and Alaska's Aleutian Islands.

questions.question:

नीचे दी गई प्रत्येक आकृति में, निम्नलिखित में से तीन समान संबंध रखते हैं और इसलिए एक समूह बनाते हैं, निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा उस समूह का भाग नहीं है?
questions.solution: All the figures except 4th are such that the 2nd image is obtained by rotating the 1st figure by 180 degrees.

questions.question:
Person P takes 36 days to finish a work alone while to finish 75% of that work person Q takes 41(2/3)% of time taken by P to finish the complete work. Q is 20% more efficient than R, then in how many days persons P and R together can finish that work?

व्यक्ति P किसी कार्य को अकेले पूरा करने में 36 दिन लेता है, जबकि व्यक्ति Q उस कार्य का 75% पूरा करने में, P द्वारा पूरे कार्य को पूरा करने में लिए गए समय का 41(2/3)% लेता है। Q, R से 20% अधिक कार्य कुशल है, तो एक साथ व्यक्ति P और R उस कार्य को कितने दिनों में पूरा कर सकते हैं?
questions.solution:
Time taken by P alone to finish the work = 36 days

Time taken by Q alone to finish the 75% of the work = 41(2/3)% of 36 = 15 days

Time taken by Q alone to finish the complete work = 15 * (100/75) = 20 days

Ratio of efficiency of Q to R = 120%: 100% = 6: 5

Time taken by R alone to finish the work = 20 * (6/5) = 24 days

Time taken by P and R together to finish the work = 1/[(1/36) + (1/24)] = 14.4 days

questions.question:
Given that a, b, c are in continued proportion; b, c, d are in continued proportion and c, d, e are also in continued proportion. If b : c = 2:3 and all the five numbers are positive integers, what is the minimum possible value of (b+c+d) ?

दिया गया है कि a, b, c सतत अनुपात में हैं; b, c, d सतत अनुपात में हैं और c, d, e भी सतत अनुपात में हैं। यदि b : c = 2 : 3 है और सभी पाँच संख्याएँ धनात्मक पूर्णांक हैं, तो (b+c+d) का न्यूनतम संभव मान क्या होगा?
questions.solution: If b : c = 2:3, then a : b is also 2:3. So a : b : c = 4:6:9 Similarly, if b : c = 6:9 and c : d = 2:3, then a : b : c : d = 8:12:18:27 Also, if c : d = 18:27 and d : e = 2:3, then a : b : c : d : e = 16:24:36:54:81. Since, a, b, c, d and e are positive integers, so minimum value of b+c+d = 24+36+54 = 114. Hence option 4

questions.question:
Mr. Haque's total annual gross salary, which was Rs. 10 lakhs per year in 2007, has been reduced by 10% in 2008. In 2007 his family expenditure for food items was 40% of the total annual gross salary. The prices of average food items have increased by 5% between 2007 and 2008. Assuming that the family consumed the same amount of food in 2008, the percentage expenditure on food items, calculated on total annual gross salary in 2008, is approximately:

मिस्टर हक का कुल वार्षिक सकल वेतन, जो वर्ष 2007 में 10 लाख रुपये प्रति वर्ष, वर्ष 2008 में 10% कम कर दिया जाता है। वर्ष 2007 में खाद्य पदार्थों के लिए उनके परिवार का व्यय, कुल वार्षिक सकल वेतन का 40% था। वर्ष 2007 और वर्ष 2008 के बीच औसत खाद्य पदार्थों की कीमतों में 5% की वृद्धि हुई है। यह मानते हुए कि परिवार ने वर्ष 2008 में भोजन की समान मात्रा का उपभोग किया, तो वर्ष 2008 में कुल वार्षिक सकल वेतन पर गणना की गई खाद्य पदार्थों पर अनुमानित प्रतिशत व्यय कितना है?
questions.solution:
Total salary in 2008 = 90% of 10 lakhs = Rs 9 lakhs

Expenditure on food items in 2007 = 40% of 10 lakhs = Rs 4 lakhs

Expenditure on food items in 2008 = 1.05 X 4 = Rs 4.2 lakhs

The percentage expenditure on food items, calculated on total annual gross salary in 2008, is approximately =

4.2 9 X100=46.67%

Option 3

questions.question:
Study the given statements and select the appropriate answer option based on them.

Statements:

I. Five people are seated in a linear row facing north.

II. F is seated second to the right of K.

III. B is seated to the immediate left of P.

IV. P is seated second to the right of F.

V. A is seated to the immediate left of F.

दिए गए कथनों का अध्ययन कीजिए और उनके आधार पर उपयुक्त उत्तर विकल्प का चयन कीजिए।

कथन :

I. पाँच व्यक्ति एक रेखीय पंक्ति में उत्तर की ओर मुखरित होकर बैठे हैं।

II. F, K के दाएँ ओर से दूसरे स्थान पर बैठा है।

III. B, P के निकटस्थ बाएँ ओर बैठा है।

IV. P, F के दाएँ ओर से दूसरे स्थान पर बैठा है।

V. A, F के निकटस्थ बाएँ ओर बैठा है।
options: K is seated third to the left of B.K, B के बाएँ ओर से तीसरे स्थान पर बैठा है।
A is seated to the right of P.A, P के दाएँ ओर बैठा है।
F is seated to the immediate right of B.F, B के निकटस्थ दाएँ ओर बैठा है।
B is seated third to the right of A.B, A के दाएँ ओर से तीसरे स्थान पर बैठा है।
questions.answer: K is seated third to the left of B.K, B के बाएँ ओर से तीसरे स्थान पर बैठा है।
questions.solution:
We have:

F is seated second to the right of K. P is seated second to the right of F.

A is seated to the immediate left of F.

B is seated to the immediate left of P.

questions.question:
Mr. Shashi Prakash Singh borrows a sum of Rs. 70,000 from IDBI bank as a personal loan and decided to pay it in three annual installments. The rate of interest offered by IDBI for personal loans is 14% compounded annually. However, being a priority customer Shashi got to avail the loan at 2% less interest. The amount paid in the first and second installments are Rs. 30,000 and 32,000 respectively. The approximate amount (in Rupees) that needs to be paid by him after the 3rd year so that the loan gets repaid in totality is:

मिस्टर शशि प्रकाश सिंह आईडीबीआई बैंक से व्यक्तिगत ऋण के रूप में 70,000 रुपये की धनराशि उधार लेते हैं और इसे तीन वार्षिक किश्तों में भुगतान करने का निर्णय लेते है। व्यक्तिगत ऋणों के लिए आईडीबीआई द्वारा दी जाने वाली ब्याज की दर 14% वार्षिक रूप से संयोजित होती है। हालाँकि, प्राथमिकता वाले ग्राहक होने के नाते शशि को 2% कम ब्याज की दर पर ऋण प्राप्त हुआ। पहली और दूसरी किस्त में भुगतान की गई धनराशि क्रमशः 30,000 रुपये और 32,000 रुपये हैं। ऋण को पूरी तरह से पुनर्भुगतान करने के लिए अनुमानित धनराशि (रुपयों में) कितना है, जिसे उन्हें तीसरे वर्ष के बाद भुगतान करने की आवश्यकता है?
questions.solution:
P = Rs. 70,000; R = 14% - 2% = 12%

Amount after 1st year = 70,000(1+12/100) = Rs. 78,400

Amount repaid after 1st year = Rs. 30,000

Amount left = Rs. 48,400

Amount after 2nd year = 48400(1+12/100) = 54,208

Amount repaid at the end of 2nd year = Rs. 32,000

So, amount left = 22,208

Amount to be repaid at the end of 3rd year = 22,208 (1+12/100) = Rs. 24,872.96

questions.question:
Which of the following Temple complex is prominent in the state of Bihar?

निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा मन्दिर परिसर बिहार राज्य में प्रसिद्ध है?
options: Mahabodhi Temple Complexमहाबोधि मन्दिर परिसर
Kailasa Temple Complexकैलाश मन्दिर परिसर
questions.answer: Mahabodhi Temple Complexमहाबोधि मन्दिर परिसर
questions.solution:
The Mahabodhi Temple Complex at Bodh Gaya lies 115 km south of the capital city of Patna in the state of Bihar.

It is one of the four holy sites related to the life of the Lord Buddha, and particularly to the attainment of Enlightenment. The property encompasses the greatest remains of the 5th-6th century A.D in the Indian sub-continent belonging to this period of antiquity. The first temple was built by Emperor Asoka in the 3rd century B.C.

questions.question:
Dree festival is a popular festival celebrated in which state?

द्री त्योहार किस राज्य में मनाया जाने वाला एक लोकप्रिय त्योहार है?
questions.solution:
Dree festival is a popular festival in Arunachal Pradesh and it is an important agricultural festival of Apatani tribe. This is the biggest festival celebrated by Apatani and it is marked by sacrificial offerings and prayers. This festival is celebrated on 5th of July and you can witness this auspicious festival in Ziro district of Arunachal Pradesh. Dree is celebrated in order to bring a bountiful harvest season, hence, Apatani offers prayers to four Gods they follow - Tamu, Harniang, Metii, and Danyi. This three day long agricultural festival is joyously celebrated with traditional cloths worn by women and children.

Other festivals:-

questions.question:
Which of the following Vice-Presidents of India was unopposed?

निम्नलिखित में से भारत के कौन-से उप-राष्ट्रपति निर्विरोध रहे थे?
options: Shankar Dayal Sharmaशंकर दयाल शर्मा
All of the aboveउपर्युक्त सभी
questions.answer: All of the aboveउपर्युक्त सभी
questions.solution:
The Vice-President of India is the second highest constitutional office in the Indian Government after the President. In accordance with Article 65 of the Indian Constitution, the Vice-President discharges the functions of the President when a contingency arises due to the resignation, removal, death or the inability of the President to discharge his functions. He is also the ex officio chairperson of the Rajya Sabha, the upper house of the Parliament of India.

Unopposed Vice Presidents are:

Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan

Mohammad Hidayatullah

Shankar Dayal Sharma

questions.question:
The objective of the Stand-Up India scheme is to provide__________________.

स्टैंड-अप इंइण्डिया योजना का उद्देश्य ___________ प्रदान करना है।
options: Financing for SCs, STs and women entrepreneurs to realise their business ideas.अनुसूचित जाति, अनुसूचित जनजाति और महिला उद्यमियों को उनके व्यावसायिक विचारों को साकार करने के लिए वित्त पोषण।
Cluster development of artisans and traditional industries.कारीगरों और पारम्परिक उद्योगों का समूह विकास।
financial assistance to the poor below the poverty line women widows.गरीबी रेखा से नीचे के गरीब महिला विधवाओं को वित्तीय सहायता।
Universalisation of Elementary Education (UEE) in a time-bound manner.समयबद्ध तरीके से प्रारंभिक शिक्षा का सार्वभौमीकरण (UEE)।
questions.answer: Financing for SCs, STs and women entrepreneurs to realise their business ideas.अनुसूचित जाति, अनुसूचित जनजाति और महिला उद्यमियों को उनके व्यावसायिक विचारों को साकार करने के लिए वित्त पोषण।
questions.solution: Government of India launched the Stand Up India scheme on 5th April, 2016. The Scheme facilitates bank loans between Rs.10 lakh and Rs.1 crore to at least one Scheduled Caste/ Scheduled Tribe borrower and at least one Woman borrower per bank branch for setting up greenfield enterprises. This enterprise may be in manufacturing, services or the trading sector. The scheme which is being implemented through all Scheduled Commercial Banks is to benefit at least 2.5 lakh borrowers. The scheme is operational and the loan is being extended through Scheduled Commercial Banks across the country. Stand Up India scheme caters to promoting entrepreneurship amongst women, SC & ST category i.e those sections of the population facing significant hurdles due to lack of advice/mentorship as well as inadequate and delayed credit. The scheme intends to leverage the institutional credit structure to reach out to these underserved sectors of the population in starting greenfield enterprises. It caters to both ready and trainee borrowers.

questions.question:
Kabir was a disciple of which of the following leaders of the Bhakti Movement?

कबीर भक्ति आन्दोलन के निम्नलिखित में से किस नेता के शिष्य थे?
questions.solution: Kabir is widely believed to have become one of the many disciples of the Bhakti poet-sant Swami Ramananda in Varanasi, known for devotional Vaishnavism with a strong bent to monist Advaita philosophy teaching that God was inside every person, everything.

questions.question:
The following question consists of five figures marked 1,2,3,4 and 5 called the Problem Figures followed by four other figures marked I, II, III and IV called the Answer Figures. Select a figure from amongst the Answer Figures which will continue the same series as established by the five Problem Figures.

निम्नलिखित प्रश्न में 1,2,3,4 और 5 चिह्नित पाँच अंक हैं, जिन्हें समस्या आकृति कहा जाता है, इसके बाद I, II, III और IV के रूप में चिह्नित चार अन्य आकृतियों को उत्तर आकृति कहा जाता है। उत्तर आकृतियों में से उस एक आकृति का चयन कीजिए, जो पाँच समस्या आकृतियों द्वारा स्थापित समान शृंखला को जारी रखेगी।
questions.solution:
The square moves one step along the other corner on the horizontal line and then remains in the same position in the next step. Again it moves back to the other corner in the horizontal line and so on.

The circle moves one step anticlockwise direction and then moves to the other corner diagonally and so on.

The triangle shift to the corner on the right in one step and then again to the corner on the left and so on.

questions.question:
Which of the following major environmental movements in India is NOT correctly matched with its place?

भारत में निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा प्रमुख पर्यावरण आंदोलन अपने स्थान से सही सुमेलित नही है?
options: Appiko Movement - Keralaअप्पिको आंदोलन - केरल
Bishnoi Movement - Rajasthanबिश्नोई आंदोलन - राजस्थान
Chipko Movement - Uttarakhandचिपको आंदोलन - उत्तराखंड
Jungle Bachao Andholan - Bihar-Jharkhandजंगल बचाओ आंदोलन - बिहार-झारखंड
questions.answer: Appiko Movement - Keralaअप्पिको आंदोलन - केरल
questions.solution:
Major Environmental Movements in India are:

1. Bishnoi Movement - Khejarli, Marwar region, Rajasthan state

2. Chipko Movement - Chamoli district and Tehri-Garhwal district of Uttarakhand

3. Save Silent Valley Movement - Palakkad district of Kerala

4. Jungle Bachao Andholan - Singhbhum district of Bihar-Jharkhand

5. Appiko Movement - Uttara Kannada and Shimoga districts of Karnataka State

6. Narmada Bachao Andholan (NBA) - Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra

7. Tehri Dam Conflict- Bhagirathi River near Tehri in Uttarakhand.

questions.question:
If C ++ F ?? A // G !! D {} B, then which of the following statements is not correct?

X {} Y means X is the father of Y

X ++ Y means X is the sister of Y

X // Y means X is the husband of Y

X !! Y means X is the mother of Y

X ?? Y means X is the son of Y

यदि C ++ F ?? A // G !! D {} B है, तो निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा कथन सही नहीं है?

X {} Y का अर्थ X, Y का पिता है।

X ++ Y का अर्थ X, Y की बहन है।

X // Y का अर्थ X, Y का पति है।

X !! Y का अर्थ X, Y की माता है।

X ?? Y का अर्थ X, Y का बेटा है।
options: C has only one brotherC का केवल एक भाई है।
F is the brother of DF, D का भाई है।
A is the grandfather of BA, B का दादा/नाना है।
C is the sister of FC, F की बहन है।
questions.answer: C has only one brotherC का केवल एक भाई है।
questions.solution:
It is given that, C ++ F ?? A // G !! D {} B.

It means that, C is the sister of F, F is son of A, A is the husband of G, G is the mother of D and D is the father of B.

The family diagram is,

Here, C has two brothers, F is the brother of D, A is the grandfather of B, C is the sister of F.

Hence, option (1) is not correct.

questions.question:
What does V stands for in VoIP i.e. a term used in Internet world?

VoIP यानी इंटरनेट की दुनिया में उपयोग किया जाने वाले शब्द में V का क्या अर्थ है?
questions.solution: Voice over Internet Protocol (also voice over IP, VoIP or IP telephony) is a methodology and group of technologies for the delivery of voice communications and multimedia sessions over Internet Protocol (IP) networks, such as the Internet.

questions.question:
Which of the following statement is true?

I. Product of √78 and √312 is irrational.

II. If x = √(1256 - 1763 + 1083), then 'x' is rational.

निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा कथन सत्य है?

I. √78 और √312 का गुणनफल अपरिमेय है।

II. यदि x = √(1256 - 1763 + 1083) है, तो 'x' परिमेय है।
options: Both I and III और II दोनों
Neither I nor IIन तो I न ही II
questions.solution:
From I: Product of √78 and √312 = √244336 = 156 (rational)

So, this statement is false.

From II: x = √(1256 - 1763 + 1083) = √576 = 24 (rational)

So, this statement is true.

questions.question:
Four pairs of letter-clusters have been given out of which three are alike in some manner, while one is different. Choose the odd one out.

अक्षर-समूहों के चार युग्म दिए गए हैं, जिनमें से तीन किसी प्रकार से एक समान हैं, जबकि एक भिन्न है। इसमें से एक असंगत का चयन कीजिए।
questions.solution:
The ranks of A and Z are equal when counted alphabetically and in the reverse alphabetical order (1) respectively. Similarly, B and Y, C and X, etc have equal ranks.

Now, 1 position is subtracted from each letter. For ex:

I - 1 = H and the letter that has same rank as H when counted in reverse order - S

C - 1 = B - Y

K - 1 = J - Q

Similarly, TRO and HLD follow the same pattern but PSY - GEA does not.

questions.question:
The Chairman and members of a state public service commission can be removed only by_____________.

राज्य लोक सेवा आयोग के अध्यक्ष और सदस्यों को केवल _________ द्वारा हटाया जा सकता है।
options: Governor of the stateराज्य के राज्यपाल
Chief Minister of the stateराज्य के मुख्यमंत्री
President of Indiaभारत के राष्ट्रपति
Prime Minister of Indiaभारत के प्रधानमंत्री
questions.answer: President of Indiaभारत के राष्ट्रपति
questions.solution:
In the field of public service commissions, the Centre - state relations are as follows:

The Chairman and members of a state public service commission, though appointed by the governor of the state, can be removed only by the President

The Parliament can establish a Joint State Public Service Commission (JSPSC) for two or more states on the request of the state legislatures concerned. The chairman and members of the JSPSC are appointed by the president.

questions.question:
Consider the following National Highways:

A. NH 27

B. NH 48

C. NH 44

D. NH 52

Arrange the above given National Highways in longest to shortest of lengths among them and choose the correct answer from the codes given below:

निम्नलिखित राष्ट्रीय राजमार्गों पर विचार कीजियेए :

A. NH 27

B. NH 48

C. NH 44

D. NH 52

उपर्युक्त दिए गए राष्ट्रीय राजमार्गों को उनके बीच सबसे लंबी से छोटी लंबाई में व्यवस्थित कीजिये और नीचे दिए गए कूट से सही उत्तर चुनिए :
options: A, B, C, DA, B, C, D
B, C, A, DB, C, A, D
C, A, B, DC, A, B, D
D, C, A, BD, C, A, B
questions.answer: C, A, B, DC, A, B, D
questions.solution:
· National Highway 44 is the longest highway which runs from Srinagar to Kanyakumari.

· National Highway 27 connects Porbandar to Silchar.

· National Highway 48 connects Delhi to Chennai.

· National Highway 52 connects Sangrur to Ankola in Karnataka.

questions.question:
The Massacre Ghat that located on the southern bank of the River Ganges is related to which of the following historical event?

गंगा नदी के दक्षिणी तट पर स्थित हत्याकांड(मस्कारा) घाट निम्नलिखित में से कौन-से ऐतिहासिक घटना से संबंधित है?
options: Jallianwala Bagh massacreजलियांवाला बाग हत्याकांड
Indian Sepoy Mutinyभारतीय सिपाही विद्रोह
Quit India Movementभारत छोड़ो आंदोलन
questions.answer: Indian Sepoy Mutinyभारतीय सिपाही विद्रोह
questions.solution: The Massacre Ghat is located on the southern bank of the River Ganges and marks the northern boundary of the city of Kanpur and became historically important during the Indian Rebellion of 1857 (the Indian Sepoy Mutiny). Known as the Siege of Cawnpore (now Kanpur) in British colonial records, took place on June 27, 1857. When 300 British men, women and children were slaughtered and later 120 women and children were taken to Kanpur, killed and thrown into a well (known as the Bibighar Massacre). The murders greatly embittered the British rank-and-file against the Sepoy rebels and inspired the war cry "Remember Cawnpore".

questions.question:
Sakshi Malik is associated with which of the following sporting events?

साक्षी मलिक निम्नलिखित में से किस खेल स्पर्धा से जुड़ी हैं?
questions.solution:
Sakshi Malik is one of the most famous Indian freestyle wrestler.

She famously opened India’s medal tally at the Rio Olympics, winning bronze in the 58kg category after she beat Kyrgyzstan’s Aisuluu Tynybekova.

The win cemented Malik’s place in history, making her one of only four Indian women to have ever won an Olympic medal.

questions.question:
Select the related word/letter/number from the given alternatives.

AB3: ZY51 :: EF11:?

दिए गए विकल्पों में से संबंधित शब्द/अक्षर/संख्या को चुनिए।

AB3: ZY51 :: EF11:?
questions.solution:
The position values of the alphabets are used where A=1, B=2, C=3 and so on

The 1st alphabet's forward position value is equal to the reverse position value of the alphabet in the reverse order. For ex A-Z, B-Y, C-X, D-W, E-V and so on

The number is the sum of their forward position values.

questions.question:
In the question below, a statement is followed by two assumptions I and II. An assumption is something supposed or taken for granted. You have to consider the statement and the given assumptions and decide which of the assumptions is implicit in the statement.

Statement:

DF is a new store in the city which would provide a wide range of selections of cultural artefacts, handlooms and crafts that would reflect the art and culture of the indigenous people.

Assumptions:

I. Prior to DF, there was no store that reflected the art and culture of the indigenous people.

II. The store was opened after the indigenous tribes requested the city authority to have such a store in the city.

नीचे दिए गए प्रश्न में एक कथन का अनुसरण करते हुए दो धारणाएं I और II हैं। एक धारणा को कुछ माना जाता है या बिना प्रमाण के मान लिया जाता है। आपको कथन और दी गई धारणाओं पर विचार करना है और निर्धारित करना है कि कौन-सी धारणा कथन में निहित है।

कथन :

DF शहर में एक नया स्टोर है, जो सांस्कृतिक कलाकृतियों, हथकरघा और शिल्प की एक विस्तृत शृंखला प्रदान करेगा, जो स्वदेशी व्यक्तियों की कला और संस्कृति को प्रतिबिंबित करेगा।

धारणा :

I. DF से पहले, स्वदेशी व्यक्तियों की कला और संस्कृति को प्रतिबिंबित करने वाला कोई स्टोर नहीं था।

II. स्थानीय जनजातियों द्वारा शहर के प्राधिकरण से अनुरोध करने के बाद शहर में इस प्रकार स्टोर रहने के लिए खोला गया था।
options: Only II is implicitकेवल II निहित है।
Both I and II are implicitI और II दोनों निहित हैं।
Only I is implicitकेवल I निहित है।
Neither I nor II is implicitन तो I न ही II निहित है
questions.answer: Neither I nor II is implicitन तो I न ही II निहित है
questions.solution: None of the assumptions are implicit. It cannot be assumed that this is the first of its kind store in the city or that it was opened as a result of the requests by the indigenous community. Hence, the answer is option d).

questions.question:
In the question below, a statement is given depicting an issue or a problem. You have to assume everything in the statements to be true even if they are at variance from commonly known facts and on the basis of the information given in the statement, choose the option that can be the course of action(s) to be taken to address the issue.

Around 28% of the ministers resigned due to the bill which they had voted against getting passed in the parliament.

I. The bill should be withdrawn immediately.

II. These ministers should be banned from getting any government services.

नीचे दिए गए प्रश्न में किसी मुद्दे या समस्या को दर्शाने वाला एक कथन दिया गया है। आपको कथनों में दी गई सभी बातों को सत्य मानना है, भले ही वे सामान्य रूप से ज्ञात तथ्यों से भिन्न हों और कथन में दी गई जानकारी के आधार पर उस विकल्प का चयन कीजिये, जो समस्या के समाधान के लिए की जाने वाली कार्यवाही (कार्यवाहियों) हो सकता है।

लगभग 28% मंत्रियों ने उस बिल के कारण इस्तीफा दे दिया, जिसे उन्होंने संसद में पारित होने के खिलाफ वोट दिया था।

I. बिल को तुरंत वापस लिया जाना चाहिए।

II. इन मंत्रियों को कोई भी सरकारी सेवा प्राप्त करने से प्रतिबंधित किया जाना चाहिए।
options: Only I is the course of actionकेवल I ही कार्यवाही है
Only II is the course of actionकेवल II ही कार्यवाही है
Neither I nor II is the course of actionन तो I और न ही II कार्यवाही है
Either I or II is the courses of actionया तो I या II कार्यवाही हैं
questions.answer: Neither I nor II is the course of actionन तो I और न ही II कार्यवाही है
questions.solution: Neither I nor II should be the course of action. 28% is a minority which means majority voted for the bill to be passed. (II) is a harsh and unnecessary action. Hence, the answer is option c).

questions.question:
Study the given statements and select the appropriate answer option based on them.

Statements:

I. M is shorter than P.

II. L is taller than P but shorter than R.

III. S is taller than L but shorter than R.

दिए गए कथनों का अध्ययन कीजिए और उनके आधार पर उपयुक्त उत्तर विकल्प का चयन कीजिए।

कथन :

I. M, P से नाटा है।

II. L, P से लम्बा है, लेकिन R से नाटा है।

III. S, L से लम्बा है, लेकिन R से नाटा है।
options: Only one person is taller than R.केवल एक व्यक्ति R से लम्बा है।
M is the shortest.M सबसे नाटा है।
L is shorter than M.L, M से नाटा है।
P is taller than S.P, S से लम्बा है।
questions.answer: M is the shortest.M सबसे नाटा है।
questions.solution:
Based on the given statements, we get:

R > S > L > P > M

So M is the shortest.

questions.question:
Two cars start moving on a track P-Q of length 100 Km, simultaneously from cities P and Q, towards the other end. On reaching the other end, they turn around and move towards their start point. The two cars keep moving in this manner for 20 hours at a constant speed of 40 km/h and 50 km/h respectively. Find the number of times the two cars meet during this complete movement.

एक साथ दो कारें 100 किमी लंबे ट्रैक P-Q पर शहर P और Q से अन्य छोर की ओर चलना शुरू करती हैं। अन्य छोर पर पहुंचने पर, दोनों कारें मुड़ती हैं और अपने शुरुआती बिंदु की ओर बढ़ती हैं। दोनों कारें क्रमशः 40 किमी/घंटा और 50 किमी/घंटा की स्थिर गति से 20 घंटे तक इस प्रकार चलती रहती हैं। तो ज्ञात कीजिए कि दोनों कार इस पूरी प्रक्रिया के दौरान कितनी बार मिलती हैं?
questions.solution:
The speed of the faster car is 50 km/h. Distance travelled in 20 hours = 50 x 20 = 1000 km

Thus, this car will cover 10 times a track length of 100 km.

So, we can expect the faster car to cross the slower car 10 times, either in opposite direction or in the same direction. However, if the two cars meet exactly at either of the two cities P or Q, then for each such meeting they will have one less point of meeting because in that case the meeting points pertaining to two lengths will become common.

Now, the faster car is at P at t = 0, 4, 8, 12, 16 and 20 hours and at Q at t = 2, 6, 10, 14 and 18 hours. Also, the slower car is at P at t = 2.5, 7.5, 12.5 and 17.5 hours and at Q at t = 0, 5, 10, 15 and 20 hours.

From the above timings, it can be observed that on exactly one occasion the two cars meet at city Q and never at city P. Hence, the total number of times the two cars cross each other will be 10 - 1 = 9.

questions.question:
President of India is conferred with judicial powers by Article 72 of Indian Constitution. Which of the following powers is not correctly matched?

भारत के राष्ट्रपति को भारतीय संविधान के अनुच्छेद 72 द्वारा न्यायिक शक्तियां प्रदान की गई है। निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सी शक्तियां सही सुमेलित नहीं है?
options: Remission: Reducing the period of sentence without changing its characterपरिहार : इसके चरित्र को बदले बिना दण्ड की अवधि को कम करना।
Pardon: Complete absolves the offenderक्षमा : अपराधी को पूर्ण रूप से दोषमुक्त करना।
Commutation: Substitution of one form of punishment to a lighter formन्यूनीकरण : दण्ड के एक रूप को हल्के रूप में बदलना।
Reprieve: Awarding a lesser sentence in place of one originally awardedप्रविलंबन : मूल रूप से दिए गए दण्ड के स्थान पर कम सजा देना।
questions.answer: Reprieve: Awarding a lesser sentence in place of one originally awardedप्रविलंबन : मूल रूप से दिए गए दण्ड के स्थान पर कम सजा देना।
questions.solution:
Article 72 says that the President shall have the power to grant pardons, reprieves, respites or remissions of punishment or to suspend, remit or commute the sentence of any person convicted of any offence. The meaning of these terms is as follows:

● Pardon: Complete absolves the offender

● Reprieve: Temporary suspension of sentence (especially that of death)

● Respite: Awarding a lesser sentence in place of one originally awarded

● Remission: Reducing the period of sentence without changing its character

● Commutation: Substitution of one form of punishment to a lighter form

questions.question:
Deepika's bank exam had 75 problems of which 10 were from arithmetic, 30 from verbal and 35 from GK. She answered 70% of the arithmetic, 40% of the verbal and 60% of the GK correctly and there was no penalty for wrong answers. To clear the cut-off, one has to get 60% of the total problems correct with all questions carrying 1 mark each. By how many marks did she clear or not clear the cut-off?

दीपिका की बैंक परीक्षा में 75 प्रश्न थे, जिनमें से 10 प्रश्न अंकगणित से, 30 प्रश्न शाब्दिक तर्कशक्ति से और 35 प्रश्न सामान्य ज्ञान से थे। उसने अंकगणित के 70%, शाब्दिक तर्कशक्ति के 40% और सामान्य ज्ञान के 60% का सही उत्तर दिया और गलत उत्तरों के लिए कोई दण्ड का प्रावधान नहीं था। कट-ऑफ उत्तीर्ण करने के लिए, एक व्यक्ति को कुल प्रश्नों का 60% सही करना होगा, जिसमें सभी प्रश्न 1 अंक के हैं। तो, उसने कट-ऑफ कितने अंकों से उत्तीर्ण किया या नहीं किया?
options: Did not clear by 5 marks5 अंकों से उत्तीर्ण नहीं किया
Cleared by 5 marks5 अंकों से उत्तीर्ण किया
Did not clear by 10 marks10 अंकों से उत्तीर्ण नहीं किया
Cleared by 10 marks10 अंकों से उत्तीर्ण किया
questions.answer: Did not clear by 5 marks5 अंकों से उत्तीर्ण नहीं किया
questions.solution:
Cut-off marks = 60% of total problems = (60/100)*75 = 45 marks

70% of 10 Arithmetic + 40% of 30 Verbal + 60% of 35 GK = 7+12+21 = 40

So she requires 45-40 = 5 more marks as correct.

questions.question:
In each of the following questions, each question is followed by two statements. Read all the statements carefully and find that which of the following statement(s) is/are sufficient to answer the question.

What is the profit% earned on the item?

Statement I: Profit earned on selling 30 items is equal to the cost price of 6 items.

Statement II: Item is marked at 40% above its cost price and then 25% discount is given on its marked price.

निम्नलिखित प्रत्येक प्रश्न में, प्रत्येक प्रश्न के बाद दो कथन दिए गए हैं। सभी कथनों को ध्यानपूर्वक अध्ययन कीजिये और ज्ञात कीजिए कि निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा/से कथन प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त है/हैं।

वस्तु पर अर्जित लाभ% कितना होगा?

कथन I: 30 वस्तुओं को बेचने पर अर्जित लाभ 6 वस्तुओं के क्रय मूल्य के बराबर है।

कथन II: वस्तु पर उसके क्रय मूल्य से 40% मूल्यवृद्धित अंकित किया जाता है और फिर उसके अंकित मूल्य पर 25% की छूट दी जाती है।
options: Only statement II is sufficient.केवल कथन II पर्याप्त है।
Either statement I or II alone is sufficient.या तो कथन I या II अकेले पर्याप्त है।
Only statement I is sufficient.केवल कथन I पर्याप्त है।
Both statement I and II together are sufficient.एक साथ कथन I और II दोनों पर्याप्त हैं।
questions.answer: Either statement I or II alone is sufficient.या तो कथन I या II अकेले पर्याप्त है।
questions.solution:
From statement I: Profit earned on selling 30 items is equal to the cost price of 6 items.

Profit = 30 * SP - 30 * CP = 6 * CP

SP/CP = 6/5

Then, profit% = ((SP/CP) - 1) * 100 = ((6/5) - 1) * 100 = 20%

From statement II: Item is marked at 40% above its cost price and then 25% discount is given on its marked price.

MP = 140% of CP = 1.4CP

SP = 75% of 1.4CP = 1.05CP

Therefore, profit% = ((SP - CP)/CP) * 100 = ((1.05CP - CP)/CP) * 100 = 5%

Hence, either statement I or II alone is sufficient.

questions.question:
The question below consists of two statements numbered I and II given below it. You have to decide whether the data given in the statements are sufficient to answer the question.

Seven people A, B, C, D, E, F and G are staying in a seven floored building in which the lowermost floor is numbered as one and the topmost floor is numbered as seven. No floor is vacant.

Who stays immediately above D?

Statement I: B stays above E. F stays on the third floor. Two people stay between F and E. D stays on an odd numbered floor between B and F.

Statement II: F stays immediately above A. Four people stay between B and A. A stays on the second floor. Only one person stays between F and D and D does not stay below A.

नीचे दिये गए प्रश्न के नीचे दो कथन और क्रमांकित I और II दिए गए हैं। आपको निर्धारित करना है कि कथनों में दी गई सूचना प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त है या नहीं।

सात व्यक्ति A, B, C, D, E, F और G एक सात मंजिल वाली बिल्डिंग में रहते हैं जिसमें सबसे नीचे वाला मंजिल संख्या एक से क्रमांकित है और सबसे ऊपर वाला मंजिल संख्या सात से क्रमांकित है और कोई भी मंजिल खाली नहीं है।

D के ठीक ऊपर वाले मंजिल पर कौन-सा व्यक्ति रहता है?

कथन I: B, E के ऊपर वाले मंजिल पर रहता है। F, तीसरे मंजिल पर रहता है। दो व्यक्ति F और E के बीच वाले मंजिल पर रहते हैं। D, B और F के बीच विषम संख्या वाले मंजिल पर रहता है।

कथन II: F, A के ठीक ऊपर वाले मंजिल पर रहता है। B और A के बीच वाले मंजिल में चार व्यक्ति रहते हैं। A, दूसरे मंजिल पर रहता है। F और D के बीच वाले मंजिल पर केवल एक व्यक्ति रहता है और D, A के नीचे वाले मंजिल पर नहीं रहता है।
options: If the data in statement I alone are sufficient to answer the question, while the data in statement II alone are not sufficient to answer the questionयदि अकेले कथन I की सूचना प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त है, जबकि अकेले कथन II की सूचना प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त नहीं है।

If the data in statement II alone are sufficient to answer the question, while the data in statement I alone are not sufficient to answer the questionयदि अकेले कथन II की सूचना प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त है, जबकि अकेले कथन I की सूचना प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त नहीं है।
If the data in both statements I and II together are necessary to answer the questionयदि एक साथ कथन I और II दोनों की सूचनाएँ प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए आवश्यक हैं।
If the data given in both statements I and II together are not sufficient to answer the questionयदि एक साथ कथन I और II दोनों की सूचनाएँ प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त नहीं हैं।
questions.answer: If the data in statement I alone are sufficient to answer the question, while the data in statement II alone are not sufficient to answer the questionयदि अकेले कथन I की सूचना प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त है, जबकि अकेले कथन II की सूचना प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त नहीं है।
questions.solution:
Statement I:

B stays above E. F stays on the third floor. Two people stay between F and E. D stays on an odd numbered floor between B and F.

We get,

Here, E stays immediately above D.

Hence, statement I alone is sufficient.

Statement II:

F stays immediately above A. Four people stay between B and A. A stays on the second floor. Only one person stays between F and D and D does not stay below A.

We do not have further information hence statement II alone is not sufficient.

Hence, the data in statement I alone are sufficient to answer the question, while the data in statement II alone are not sufficient to answer the question.

questions.question:
In a cricket match five batsman scored different number of runs. Total runs scored by Rahul is 1 more than 5/2 times of the total runs scored by Shreyas, who scored 7 runs more than the runs scored by Rohit. Dhoni scored 7 runs more than the runs scored by Manish. If Rohit scored 17 runs and Dhoni scored 39 runs, then find the square of the difference between the average runs scored by the top four scorers and the average runs scored by the bottom four scorers.

एक क्रिकेट मैच में पांच बल्लेबाज अलग-अलग रन बनाते हैं। राहुल द्वारा बनाए गए कुल रन, श्रेयस द्वारा बनाए गए कुल रनों के 5/2 गुना से 1 अधिक हैं तथा श्रेयस ने रोहित द्वारा बनाए गए रनों से 7 रन अधिक बनाए हैं। धोनी ने मनीष द्वारा बनाए गए रनों से 7 रन अधिक बनाए हैं। यदि रोहित ने 17 रन बनाए हैं और धोनी ने 39 रन बनाए हैं, तो शीर्ष रन बनाने वाले चार खिलाडियों द्वारा बनाए गए औसत रनों और निम्न रन बनाने वाले चार खिलाडियों द्वारा बनाए गए औसत रनों के बीच के अंतर का वर्ग ज्ञात कीजिए।
questions.solution:
Rohit = 17

Shreyas = 17 + 7 = 24

Rahul = 5/2 * 24 + 1 = 61

Dhoni = 39

Manish = 39 - 7 = 32

Average runs scored by the top four scorers = (24 + 61 + 39 + 32)/4 = 39

Average runs scored by the bottom four scorers = (17 + 24 + 39 + 32)/4 = 28

Square of the difference = (39 - 28)2 = 112 = 121

questions.question:
Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana is a Governmental plan for road development implemented by ___________________.

प्रधानमंत्री ग्राम सड़क योजना, सड़क विकास के लिए ___________ द्वारा कार्यान्वित एक सरकारी योजना है।
options: Ministry of Housing and Urban Poverty Alleviationआवास और शहरी गरीबी उपशमन मंत्रालय
Ministry of Road Transport and Highwaysसड़क परिवहन और राजमार्ग मंत्रालय
Ministry of Rural Developmentग्रामीण विकास मंत्रालय
Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers' Welfareकृषि एवं किसान कल्याण मंत्रालय
questions.answer: Ministry of Rural Developmentग्रामीण विकास मंत्रालय
questions.solution:
Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY) being implemented by the Ministry of Rural Development is a one-time special intervention of the Union Government to provide rural connectivity, by way of single all-weather road, to the eligible unconnected habitations in the core network.

Under PMGSY, roads are being constructed, maintained and repaired as per the specification laid down in Ministry of Rural Development Specifications for Rural Roads.

As per the programme guidelines, Maintenance of rural roads constructed under Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY) is the responsibility of the State Government.

questions.question:
In the given question, LHS = RHS only when we interchange numbers _____ on the same side.

9 - 7 x 2 + 35 ÷ 5 = 24 - 5 x 12 ÷ 3

दिए गए प्रश्न में, बायाँ पक्ष (LHS) = दायाँ पक्ष (RHS) केवल तभी होता है जब हम समान तरफ संख्याओं ___________ को आपस में बदलते हैं।

9 - 7 x 2 + 35 ÷ 5 = 24 - 5 x 12 ÷ 3
questions.solution:
We have:

9 - 7 x 2 + 35 ÷ 5 = 24 - 5 x 12 ÷ 3

After interchanging 3 and 5, we get:

9 - 7 x 2 + 35 ÷ 5 = 24 - 3 x 12 ÷ 5

9 - 14 + 7 = 24 -3 x 12 ÷ 5

LHS is not equal to RHS

After interchanging 24 and 12, we get:

9 - 7 x 2 + 35 ÷ 5 = 12 - 5 x 24 ÷ 3

9 - 14 + 7 = 12 - 40

LHS is not equal to RHS

After interchanging 5 and 7, we get:

9 - 5 x 2 + 35 ÷ 7 = 24 - 5 x 12 ÷ 3

9 - 10 + 5 = 24- 20

4= 4

LHS is equal to RHS

After interchanging 9 and 5, we get:

5 - 7 x 2 + 35 ÷ 9 = 24 - 5 x 12 ÷ 3

So LHS is not equal to RHS

questions.question:
Who among the following provided protection and support to Akbar, the rebellious son of Aurangzeb?

निम्नलिखित में से किसने औरंगजेब के विद्रोही पुत्र अकबर को सुरक्षा और सहायता की थी?
questions.solution: Sambhaji defeated Rajaram, the younger son of Shivaji, in the war of succession. He provided protection and support to Akbar, the rebellious son of Aurangzeb.He, along with Kavikalash, was captured at Sangamesvar by a Mughal officer and executed in 1689.

What is the device used to measure potential difference and how it is connected to the device respectively?

questions.solution: Potential difference is measured in volts, V. The potential difference across a component in a circuit is measured using a voltmeter. This must be connected in parallel with the component.

questions.question:
____________ is a unique Indian species found in the tri-state border protected area of National Chambal Sanctuary

__________ राष्ट्रीय चंबल अभयारण्य के त्रि-राज्य सीमा संरक्षित क्षेत्र में पाई जाने वाली एक अनूठी भारतीय प्रजाति है
questions.solution:
National Chambal Sanctuary is the only place in India where a large wild population of India's special crocodilian Gharial is found.

Due to extensive conservation efforts by wildlife departments in Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, the relatively undisturbed riverine ecosystem of the Chambal which passes through these three states, gharial numbers have reached over 1,680 in the Chambal Sanctuary area.

questions.question:
A dealer offers a cash discount of 20% and still makes a profit of 20%, when he further allows 16 articles to a dozen to a particularly sticky bargainer. How much per cent above the cost price were his wares listed?

एक डीलर 20% की नकद छूट प्रदान करता है और फिर भी 20% का लाभ कमाता है, जब वह विशेष रूप से मोलभाव करने वाले जिद्दी सौदागर को एक दर्जन को 16 वस्तुओं की अनुमति देता है। उसके वस्तु को क्रय मूल्य से कितने प्रतिशत अधिक अंकित किया गया था?
questions.solution:
If listed price of article be Rs 100 then discounted price be Rs 80 (since discount = 20%)

After offering 16 articles to a dozen Price of 16 articles = 80 x 12

Profit = 20 %

Cost price x (say) = 60 - x x 20/100

=> x + x/5 = 60 => x=60x 5/6=50

questions.question:
Select the number from the given alternatives?

55 : 41 :: 89: ?

दिए गए विकल्पों में से संख्या का चयन कीजिए?

55 : 41 :: 89: ?
questions.solution:
55 = 72 + 6

41= 62 +5

89= 92 +8

So required answer 82 +7 =71

questions.question:
Directions [Set of 4 Questions]: Read the data carefully and answer the following questions.

In a survey, some persons are either teachers or doctors or both. Out of total males, the ratio of only teachers to only doctors is 2: 5. The total number of male persons who are both teacher and doctor is 32 which is 24 more than the total number of female persons who are both teacher and doctor.

The total number of females who are only teachers is 12 which is 8 less than the total number of male who is only doctors. The total number of people who are only doctor is 30.

निर्देश [4 प्रश्नों का समूह] : आँकड़ों को ध्यानपूर्वक पढ़िये और निम्नलिखित प्रश्नों के उत्तर दीजिए।

एक सर्वेक्षण में, कुछ व्यक्ति या तो अध्यापक हैं या डॉक्टर हैं या दोनों हैं। कुल पुरुषों में से केवल अध्यापकों तथा केवल डॉक्टरों का अनुपात 2 : 5 है। शिक्षक और डॉक्टर वाले दोनों पुरुष व्यक्तियों की कुल संख्या 32 है, जो शिक्षक और डॉक्टर दोनों महिला व्यक्तियों की कुल संख्या से 24 अधिक है।

वह महिलाएँ जो केवल अध्यापिका हैं, की कुल संख्या 12 है, जो उन पुरुषों की कुल संख्या से 8 कम है, जो केवल डॉक्टर हैं। केवल डॉक्टर वाले व्यक्तियों की कुल संख्या 30 है।


How many total (male + female) doctors are there?

कुल (पुरुष+ महिलाएँ) डॉक्टर कितने/कितनी हैं?
questions.solution:
Total male persons who are both teacher and doctor = 32

Total female persons who are both teacher and doctor = 32 - 24 = 8

The total females who are only teachers = 12

Total male who are only doctors = 12 + 8 = 20

Total male who are only teacher = = 8

Total female who are only doctors = 30 - 20 = 10


Total male doctors = 32 + 20 = 52

Total female doctors = 8 + 10 = 18

Total doctors = 52 + 18

= 70

questions.solution:
Total male persons who are both teacher and doctor = 32

Total male who are only teacher = = 8

Total female who are only doctors = 30 - 20 = 10


Total female who are only teacher = 12

Total male who are only teacher = 8

Required difference = 12 - 8

= 4

What is the ratio of total males who have exactly two occupations to the total female who have exactly one occupation?

ठीक दो व्यवसायों वाले कुल पुरुषों तथा ठीक एक व्यवसाय वाली कुल महिलाओं का अनुपात कितना है?
questions.solution:
Total male persons who are both teacher and doctor = 32

Total female persons who are both teacher and doctor = 32 - 24 = 8

The total females who are only teachers = 12

Total male who are only doctors = 12 + 8 = 20

Total male who are only teacher = = 8

Total female who are only doctors = 30 - 20 = 10


Total males who have exactly two occupations = 32

Total female who have exactly one occupation = 12 + 10 = 22

Required ratio = 32: 22

= 16: 11

South Western Railway was created by amalgamating the reorganized Hubli division from South Central Railway with Bangalore & Mysore divisions of Southern Railway.

questions.question:
A bag contains 5 red balls and 4 blue balls, and two balls are taken from the bag, then what is the probability that both the balls are of different colours?

एक बैग में 5 लाल गेंद और 4 नीली गेंद हैं तथा बैग में से दो गेंदें निकाली जाती हैं तो, दोनों गेंदों के अलग-अलग रंगों की होने की प्रायिकता कितनी है?
questions.solution:
Total number of balls in the bag = 5 + 4 = 9

Probability = (Number of Favourable cases)/(Total number of cases)

Total number of cases = 9C2 = 36

Number of Favourable cases = number of ways of selecting 1 red ball and 1 blue ball = 5C1 * 4C1 = 5 * 4 = 20

Required probability = 20/36

= 5/9

questions.question:
________________ was famously called as the “Birdman of India”

_________ को सुविदित रूप से "भारत का बर्डमैन" कहा जाता था।
questions.solution:
Salim Ali, one of the greatest ornithologists and naturalists of all time, is also known as the “Birdman of India”.

He was one of the very first scientists to carry out systematic bird surveys in India and abroad. His research work is considered highly influential in the development of ornithology.

questions.question:
Simplify: 436 * 436 - 434 * 434.

सरल कीजिये : 436 * 436 - 434 * 434.

The International Olympic Committee awarded the 2032 Summer Games to_________________.

अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलंपिक समिति ने _________ को 2032 ग्रीष्मकालीन खेलों (Summer Games) से सम्मानित किया।
questions.solution: The International Olympic Committee awarded the 2032 Summer Games to Brisbane, Australia, after designating the city earlier this year as the sole contender. Brisbane will become the third Australian city to host the Games after Melbourne in 1956 and Sydney in 2000. It is the first Olympic host to be selected under a new system that removes competitive bidding, a shift designed to reduce campaign costs and potential vote-buying. Brisbane is the capital of Queensland state. The city hosted the Commonwealth Games three years ago.

questions.question:
What is the value of (1 - sin2θ)tan2θ - (cos2θ - 1) cot2θ?

(1 - sin2θ)tan2θ - (cos2θ - 1) cot2θ का मान क्या है?
options: None of theseइनमें से कोई नहीं
questions.solution:
Here, (1 - sin2θ)tan2θ - (cos2θ - 1) cot2θ

= cos2θ * (sin2θ/cos2θ) - (-sin2θ) * (cos2θ/sin2θ)

= sin2θ + cos2θ

= 1

questions.solution:
Almora, another popular hill station of Uttarakhand is known as the cultural capital of Kumaon.

This town is situated on a 5 km mountain range situated at an altitude of 1,650 m and from a distance, its shape resembles a horseshoe.

questions.question:
In the figure given below, if PR = QR and TR bisects the ∠PRQ, then calculate ∠SRT.

नीचे दी गई आकृति में, यदि PR = QR है और TR, ∠PRQ को द्विभाजित करता है, तो ∠SRT का माप ज्ञात कीजिये।
questions.solution:
According to the question:

PR = QR

Then, ∠PQR = ∠RPQ = 49˚

So, ∠PRQ = 180 - 49 - 49 = 82˚

Now, ∠TRQ = 82/2 = 41˚

Therefore, ∠SRT = 180 - 41 = 139˚

questions.question:
Find the greatest number which after dividing 1580, 2480, and 6680 leaves the same remainder in each case.

वह सबसे बड़ी संख्या ज्ञात कीजिए जिससे 1580, 2480 और 6680 को विभाजित करने पर प्रत्येक स्थिति में समान शेषफल बचे।
questions.solution:
Required greatest number = HCF of (2480 - 1580), (6680 - 1580) and (6680 - 2480)

= HCF of 900, 5100 and 4200

= 300

Hence, required number = 300

questions.question:
Bombay Samachar is the oldest continuously published newspaper in India. It was historically printed in which language?

बॉम्बे समाचार भारत का सबसे पुराना लगातार प्रकाशित होने वाला समाचार-पत्र है। यह ऐतिहासिक रूप से किस भाषा में मुद्रित हुआ था?
questions.solution: The Bombay Samachar, now Mumbai Samachar is the oldest continuously published newspaper in India. Established in 1822 by Fardunjee Marzban, it is published in Gujarati.

questions.question:
What is the height of the cone which is formed by joining the two ends of a sector of radius 18cm and angle 60°?

18 सेमी त्रिज्या और 60° कोण वाले त्रिज्यखंड के दो सिरों को मिलाने पर निर्मित शंकु की ऊंचाई कितनी है?
questions.solution:
Given r=18cm

Arc of the sector = 2πr*60/360=2πr/6

The arc of the sector will be equal to the perimeter of the cone.

Then let the radius of the cone be R.

Then, 2πR=2πr/6

Therefore R=r/6

Further the radius of the sector will be equal to the slant height of the base of the cone. That is l=r

Therefore l2 =h2 +R2

H=√r2 - R2 =√( r2 - (r/6)2 )= √35r/6

H=√35/6*18=3√35

questions.question:
NIIF, a fund of funds set up by India to take interest in infra projects. It stands for_______.

एनआईआईएफ(NIIF), इन्फ्रा परियोजनाओं में रुचि लेने के लिए भारत द्वारा स्थापित निधियों का एक कोष है। इसका पूर्ण रूप है_______।
options: Nominal Investment & Infrastructure FundNominal Investment & Infrastructure Fund
National Infrastructure & Institutional FundNational Infrastructure & Institutional Fund
National Investment & Infrastructure FundNational Investment & Infrastructure Fund
National Institutional & Infrastructure FundNational Institutional & Infrastructure Fund
questions.answer: National Investment & Infrastructure FundNational Investment & Infrastructure Fund
questions.solution: National Investment & Infrastructure Fund (NIIF) is a fund of funds set up by India to take interest in infra projects, has a corpus of $6 billion and its largest investor so far is the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority (ADIA), which has invested $250 million.

questions.question:
Three times of Akansha's age one year hence and Chetna's age ten years hence are same. Bhaskar's present age is three times of Akansha's age one year ago. Ratio of Bhaskar's present age and Chetna's age one year ago is 6:5. If the ratio of Deepti's age four years ago and Chetna's age five years ago is 11:7, find the present age of Deepti?

एक वर्ष के बाद आकांक्षा की आयु का तीन गुना और दस वर्ष के बाद की चेतना की आयु समान है। भास्कर की वर्तमान आयु एक वर्ष पूर्व आकांक्षा की आयु की तीन गुनी है। भास्कर की वर्तमान आयु और एक वर्ष पूर्व चेतना की आयु का अनुपात 6:5 है। यदि चार वर्ष पूर्व दीप्ति की आयु और पांच वर्ष पूर्व चेतना की आयु का अनुपात 11:7 है, तो दीप्ति की वर्तमान आयु ज्ञात कीजिए?
questions.solution:
Let the present ages of Akansha, Bhaskar, Chetna and Deepti are A,B,C and D years respectively.

Acc. to the question,

3(A - 1) = B

Or 3A = B + 3

And, 3(A + 1) = C + 10

Or 3A = C + 7

And, B/(C-1) = 6/5

On solving, we get

A = 11, B = 30 and C = 26

Now, (D-4)/(C-5) = 11/7

D = 37 years

questions.question:
In a substitution reaction in organic chemistry, which of the following atoms is substituted?

कार्बनिक रसायन में प्रतिस्थापी अभिक्रिया में निम्नलिखित में से किस परमाणु को प्रतिस्थापित किया जाता है?
questions.solution:
Substituted compounds are chemical compounds where one or more hydrogen atoms of a core structure have been replaced with a functional group like alkyl, hydroxy, or halogen, or with larger substituent groups.

For example, benzene is a simple aromatic ring. Benzenes that have undergone substitution are a heterogeneous group of chemicals with a wide spectrum of uses and properties

questions.question:
If RBI lowers the Cash reserve ratio, which of the following will happen?

यदि रिजर्व बैंक नकद आरक्षित अनुपात (CRR) कम कर देता है, तो निम्नलिखित में से क्या होगा?
options: Credit creation will increaseऋण सृजन में वृद्धि होगी।
Credit creation will decreaseऋण सृजन कमी होगी।
Credit creation will not be affectedऋण सृजन प्रभावित नहीं होगा।
Banks will have less creditबैंकों के पास कम ऋण होगा।
questions.answer: Credit creation will increaseऋण सृजन में वृद्धि होगी।
questions.solution: If the Cash Reserve Ratio (CRR) is decreased by the RBI, its impact on the expansion of credit creation will be to increase it. In short, credit creation is the reciprocal of the Cash Reserve Ratio (CRR). Banks will have more credit.

questions.question:
Which of the following is a use of Borax?

I. Used in the candle industry

II. Used to get rid of rusting

III. Used in making optical glass

IV. Used to keep pests away

निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा बोरेक्स का उपयोग है?

I. मोमबत्ती उद्योग में उपयोग किया जाता है ।

II. जंग लगने से छुटकारा पाने के लिए प्रयोग किया जाता है ।

III. ऑप्टिकल ग्लास बनाने में उपयोग किया जाता है ।

IV. कीटों को दूर रखने के लिए प्रयोग किया जाता है ।
options: II and IVII और IV
I, II and IIII, II और III
I, III and IVI, III और IV
I, II, III and IVI, II, III औरIV
questions.answer: I, II, III and IVI, II, III औरIV
questions.solution:
Uses of Borax

(i) Borax is used in the laboratory for borax bead test.

(ii) It is used in the manufacture of enamels and glazes for earthen pots.

(iii) It is used in the candle industry.

(iv) It is used in the preparation of medicinal soaps due to its antiseptic character

(v) It is used in making optical glass.

(vi) It is used in softening of water and cleansing agent.

(vii) It is used to keep pests away.

(viii) It is used to get rid of rusting

questions.question:
Where was India's longest expressway inaugurated recently?

हाल ही में भारत के सबसे लंबे एक्सप्रेसवे का उद्घाटन कहाँ किया गया था?
questions.solution:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the 341-km Purvanchal Expressway in Uttar Pradesh after landing on the highway airstrip in an IAF C-130 Hercules plane. It is India's longest expressway as of now.

The 3.2-km airstrip has been constructed on the expressway to facilitate emergency landing of fighter aircraft.

The 341-km expressway links state capital Lucknow with Ghazipur and has been constructed at an estimated cost of Rs 22,500 crore.

questions.question:
There are 2 circles with equal radii of 6 cm that pass through each other's centres. What is the length of their common chord?

6 सेमी की समान त्रिज्या वाले दो वृत्त एक दूसरे के केंद्रों से होकर गुज़रते हैं। तो उनकी उभयनिष्ठ जीवा की लंबाई कितनी है?
questions.solution:
'A' and 'B' are centres of the circles.

AB = 6 cm

AE = 6/2 = 3 cm

AC = 6 cm

So, CE = √(62 - 32) = 3√3 cm

Length of common chord = CD = 2CE = 6√3 cm

questions.question:
In a set of 13 integers, two integers 'a' and 'b' are respectively replaced with sum of 'a' and 'b' and difference of 'a' and 'b' then, the average of the set is increased by 2, then what is the difference between 'a' and 'b'?

13 पूर्णांकों के एक समूह में, दो पूर्णांक 'a' और 'b' को क्रमशः 'a' और 'b' के योगफल और 'a' और 'b' के अंतर से प्रतिस्थापित किया जाता है, तो समूह का औसत 2 बढ़ जाता है। , तो 'a' और 'b' में अंतर कितना होगा?
questions.solution:
Let original average = 'x'

Now,

13x - (a + b) + [(a + b) + (a ~ b)] = 13(x + 2)

13x - (a + b) + (a + b) + (a ~ b) = 13x + 26

(a ~ b) = 26

Hence required difference = 26

questions.question:
Study the following information carefully and answer the related question.

Following table represents the data regarding savings and expenditure of four employees of a company.

What is the average of savings of all four employees taken together (in rupees)?

निम्नलिखित सूचनाओं का ध्यानपूर्वक अध्ययन कीजिये और संबंधित प्रश्न का उत्तर दीजिये ।

निम्नलिखित तालिका एक कंपनी के चार कर्मचारियों की बचत और व्यय के संबंध में आंकड़ा दर्शाती है।

सभी चार कर्मचारियों की कुल बचत का औसत (रुपयों में) कितना है?

Nasa has launched which spacecraft as a part of its first space mission to study Trojans Asteroids?

नासा ने ट्रोजन क्षुद्रग्रहों (Trojans Asteroids) का अध्ययन करने के लिए अपने पहले अंतरिक्ष मिशन के हिस्से के रूप में कौन-सा अंतरिक्ष यान लॉन्च किया है?
questions.solution: Nasa launched Lucy spacecraft, the first space mission to study the Trojans Asteroids. Lucy will journey for 12 years, observing one main belt asteroid and seven Trojan asteroids. The swarms of Trojan asteroids associated with Jupiter are thought to be remnants of the primordial material that formed the outer planets. Jupiter Trojan asteroids are leftover raw materials from the formation of big planets

questions.question:
The first National Ayurveda Day was observed on _______.

पहला राष्ट्रीय आयुर्वेद दिवस _______ को मनाया गया था।
questions.solution: The first National Ayurveda Day is observed on October 28, 2016 on the occasion of Dhanwantari Jayanti. Lord Dhanvantari is considered as the divine propagator of Ayurveda. He is conferred with the virtues of granting health and wealth. Therefore, Dhanvantari Jayanti was preferred for celebration of Ayurveda Day to nationalize this system of medicine which can prove to be a cornerstone for its ultimate globalization.

questions.question:
The great architectural works of Le Corbusier can be seen in which of the following Indian city?

ले कॉर्बूसियर के महान वास्तुशिल्प कार्यों को निम्नलिखित में से किस भारतीय शहर में देखा जा सकता है?
questions.solution:
In 2016, 17 masterpiece architectural works of Le Corbusier were added in UNESCO World Heritage Site List including the Complexe du Capitole in Chandigarh (India).

Chandigarh was one of India's first planned cities and was Le Corbusier's largest project. He was commissioned to design the masterplan in the early 1950s, after being approved by Jawaharlal Nehru, India's first prime minister.

The city was to serve as the newly independent Indian government's regional capital in Punjab, after the previous capital, Lahore, became part of Pakistan.

questions.question:
Which of the following statements is NOT correct about Constituent Assembly?

संविधान सभा के बारे में निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा कथन सही नहीं है?
options: It held eleven sessions covering a total of 165 daysइसने कुल 165 दिनों को सम्मलित करते हुए 11 सत्र आयोजित किए।
In all, 284 members actually signed the Constitution.कुल मिलाकर, 284 सदस्यों ने वास्तव में संविधान पर हस्ताक्षर किए।

On 26 November, 1949 the Assembly ceased to exist, transforming itself into the Provisional Parliament of India26 नवंबर, 1949 को विधानसभा का अस्तित्व समाप्त हो गया, स्वयं को भारत की अनंतिम संसद में बदल दिया।
All of the above are correctउपर्युक्त सभी सही हैं।
questions.answer: On 26 November, 1949 the Assembly ceased to exist, transforming itself into the Provisional Parliament of India26 नवंबर, 1949 को विधानसभा का अस्तित्व समाप्त हो गया, स्वयं को भारत की अनंतिम संसद में बदल दिया।
questions.solution:
Facts about Constituent Assembly:

During this period, it held eleven sessions covering a total of 165 days.

The Constitution of India was adopted on 26 November, 1949 and the Hon'ble members appended their signatures to it on 24 January, 1950. In all, 284 members actually signed the Constitution.

The Constitution of India came into force on 26 January, 1950. On that day, the Assembly ceased to exist, transforming itself into the Provisional Parliament of India until a new Parliament was constituted in 1952

questions.question:
BSNL recently made the first test call from the 4G network, designed and developed in India and under installation in______________.

BSNL ने हाल ही में 4जी नेटवर्क से पहली टेस्ट कॉल की है, जिसे भारत में डिजाइन किया गया और विकसित किया गया है तथा यह नेटवर्क _______ में स्थापित किया जा रहा है।
questions.solution: BSNL recently made the first test call from the 4G network, designed and developed in India and under installation at Manimajra in Chandigarh. K Rajaraman, Secretary, Telecom, Government of India, originated an IP video call to Union Minister of Communication, IT & Railways AshwiniVaishnav. To achieve the dream of Atmanirbhar Bharat in creating Indian telecom equipment for the globe, BSNL is conducting a Proof of Concept (PoC) with Tata Consultancy Services and a state-run telecom research organisation C-DOT in Chandigarh. The PoC aims to install, integrate and test the 4G equipment in BSNL's network for establishing its suitability for commercial deployment.

questions.question:
______________became the first Indian woman wrestler to win a silver medal in the World Championships.

________विश्व चैंपियनशिप में रजत पदक जीतने वाली पहली भारतीय महिला पहलवान बनीं।
questions.solution: Anshu Malik has scripted history as she became the first Indian woman wrestler to win a silver medal in the World Championships. The 20-year-old lost her final bout 1-4 to two-time Olympic medallist Helen Maroulis at the World Championships in Oslo, Norway. Sarita Mor(59kg) also won a bronze medal for the nation. Anshu, a cadet World champion and a junior Worlds silver medallist, was the third Indian to reach the final of the World championships after 2010 champion Sushil Kumar and 2018 silver medallist Bajrang Punia. Other Indian women grapplers who have won bronze medals in the past are Geeta Phogat (2012), Babita Phogat (2012), Pooja Dhanda (2018) and Vinesh Phogat (2019).

निम्नलिखित में से कौन-सा भारत में एक मुखर कला (वोकल-आर्ट) का रूप है?

The Thumri is another North Indian vocal art form based on the romantic-devotional literature inspired by the bhakti movement.

Indian Classical Music has various divisions like Khayal, Thumri, Tappa, Tarana, Hori, etc.

questions.question:
There are three inlet taps A, B and C and an outlet tap D. A, B and C can fill the tank in Olympic Games village in 10, 20 and 25 hours respectively. The outlet pipe can empty the same in 100 hours. There are 2000 villas in the games village. The tank has a capacity of 50000 litres. If the average requirement of every villa in the village per day is 40 litres, for how many hours, for the second time (after using the full capacity of the tank) should the three inlet taps be opened in order to cater to the requirement?

तीन इनलेट नल A, B और C हैं और एक आउटलेट नल D है। A, B और C ओलंपिक खेल गांव में टैंक को क्रमशः 10, 20 और 25 घंटे में भर सकते हैं। आउटलेट पाइप समान टैंक को 100 घंटे में खाली कर सकता है। खेल गांव में 2000 विला हैं। टैंक की क्षमता 50000 लीटर है। यदि गाँव के प्रत्येक विला की प्रतिदिन की औसत आवश्यकता 40 लीटर है, तो आवश्यकता को पूरी करने के लिए, दूसरी बार (टैंक की पूरी क्षमता का उपयोग करने के बाद) कितने घंटे के लिए तीन इनलेट नलों को खोले जाने चाहिए?
options: None of theseइनमें से कोई नहीं
questions.solution:
For the second time, total amount of water needed = 40 x 2000 - 50000 = 30000 litres. i.e. 3/5th of the total

Let pipes A, B and C opened for x hours.

So, x (1/10+1/20+1/25=3/5)

x = 60/19

20 N 6 N 40 N 21 N 7

20 N 6 N 40 N 21 N 7

Letters of a word are jumbled and each letter has been given a unique number. Select the combination of numbers from among the given options, so that the letters arranged accordingly will form the meaningful word.

एक शब्द के अक्षरों को अव्यवस्थित कर दिया जाता है और प्रत्येक अक्षर को एक विशिष्ट संख्या दी गई है। दिए गए विकल्पों में से संख्याओं के संयोजन का चयन इस प्रकार कीजिये कि उसके अनुसार व्यवस्थित अक्षरों से अर्थपूर्ण शब्द बने।

Find the positive value of 'p' for which the roots of polynomial (10p + 21)x2 - 66x + (p - 1) = 0 are real and equal.

'P' का धनात्मक मान ज्ञात कीजिए, जिसमें बहुपद (10p + 21)x2 - 66x + (p - 1) = 0 का मूल, वास्तविक और बराबर है।
questions.solution:
After comparing above equation with general quadratic equation: ax2 + bx + c

a = (10p + 21), b = - 66 and c = (p - 1)

We know that:

When roots of a quadratic equation are real and equal, then b2 = 4ac

Now,

(-66)2 = 4 * (10p + 21) (p - 1)

10p2 + 11p - 1110 = 0

After solving:

p = 10

questions.question:
Azadirachta indica is the scientific name of which tree?

आज़ादीराछा इंडिका किस पेड़ का वैज्ञानिक नाम है?
questions.solution:
Neem tree (Azadirachta indica), native to India, is one of the most useful trees and has an enormous amount of benefits in the world.

Numerous Research reports have appeared in different national and international scientific journals by studying its nutritional and medicinal properties.

questions.question:
Retina of the eye is comparable to which of the following parts of a traditional camera?

आँख के रेटिना की तुलना पारंपरिक कैमरे के निम्नलिखित में से किस भाग से की जा सकती है?
questions.solution: In a camera, film is used to record the image; in the eye, the image is focused on the retina, and a system of rods and cones is the front end of an image-processing system that converts the image to electrical impulses and sends the information along the optic nerve to the brain.

questions.question:
If DAM + F= 24, then what is the value of CAP?

यदि DAM + F= 24 है, तो CAP का मान क्या है?

Rani starts walking towards the north from A and after walking for 7 m she reaches the point B. She takes a right turn and walks for 12 m to reach point C which is 11 m to the north of point D. From point D, she turns towards west and walks for 19 m to reach point E. Finally, she takes a right turn and walks for 4 m to reach the final position. What is the shortest distance between the original and the final position?

रानी, बिंदु A से उत्तर दिशा की ओर चलना शुरु करती है और 7 मीटर चलने के बाद बिंदु B तक पहुँचती है। फिर वह दाएँ मुड़ती है और बिंदु C पर पहुँचने के लिए 12 मीटर चलती है, जो बिंदु D की उत्तर दिशा में 11 मीटर की दूरी पर है। फिर वह बिंदु D से, पश्चिम दिशा की ओर मुड़ती है और बिंदु E तक पहुँचने के लिए 19 मीटर चलती है। अंत में वह दाएँ मुड़ती है और अंतिम स्थान तक पहुँचने के लिए 4 मीटर चलती है। तो, प्रारंभिक तथा अंतिम स्थान के बीच की न्यूनतम दूरी कितनी है?

questions.question:
Amber Chew opened a departmental store at Great India Palace in Noida by investing Rs. 20 million. After a few months, her brother Sheesh Chew joined the business and invested Rs. 30 million. At the end of the year, the profit was shared in the ratio of 3 : 2. After how many months did Amber's brother join the business?

अंबर च्यू ने नोएडा के ग्रेट इंडिया पैलेस में 20 मिलियन रुपये का निवेश करके एक डिपार्टमेंटल स्टोर खोला। कुछ महीनों के बाद, उसके भाई शीश च्यू ने व्यवसाय में प्रवेश किया और 30 मिलियन रुपये का निवेश किया। वर्ष के अंत में, लाभ को 3 : 2 के अनुपात में बाँटा गया। तो, अंबर का भाई कितने महीनों के बाद व्यवसाय में शामिल हुआ?
questions.solution:
Amber invested 20 million for 12 months.

Let Sheesh invest after x months.

Also, The profit shared is 3:2.

So,

20*12 30(12-x)  =  3 2 480=1080-90x x= 20 3 x=6.67

Or x = 6.67

Hence, Sheesh joined after 6 months.

questions.question:
Galena is the most important ore of which element?

गैलेना (Galena) किस तत्त्व का सबसे महत्त्वपूर्ण अयस्क है?
questions.solution: Galena, also called lead glance, is the natural mineral form of lead(II) sulphide. It is the most important ore of lead and an important source of silver.

1500, 745, 370, 180, 87.5, ?

1500, 745, 370, 180, 87.5, ?

According to the National Calendar, ____________ is observed as the first month of the year.

राष्ट्रीय कैलेंडर के अनुसार, _________ को वर्ष के पहले महीने के रूप में माना जाता है।
questions.solution:
The national calendar based on the Saka Era, with Chaitra as its first month and a normal year of 365 days was adopted from 22 March 1957 along with the Gregorian calendar for the following official purposes:

- Gazette of India

- News broadcast by All India Radio

- Calendars issued by the Government of India

- Government communications addressed to the members of the public

Dates of the national calendar have a permanent correspondence with dates of the Gregorian calendar, 1 Chaitra falling on 22 March normally and on 21 March in leap year.

The specific heat capacity of a material is a physical property. Which among the following material has the highest Specific Heat?

किसी सामग्री की विशिष्ट ऊष्मा क्षमता एक भौतिक गुण है। निम्नलिखित में से किस सामग्री में उच्चतम विशिष्ट ऊष्मा होती है?
options: Kerosene Oilमिट्टी का तेल
questions.solution:
Specific heat capacity is the amount of heat energy required to raise the temperature of a substance per unit of mass. The specific heat capacity of a material is a physical property.

Examples:

Material - Specific Heat (J/Kg K)

Lead - 130

Mercury - 140

Kerosene Oil - 210

Iron - 460

Ice - 2100

Water - 4200

questions.question:
Pattachitra style of painting is one of the oldest and most popular art forms of _____________.

चित्रकारी की पट्टचित्र शैली _________ के सबसे पुराने और सबसे लोकप्रिय कला रूपों में से एक है।
questions.solution:
Pattachitra are a cloth-based scroll painting from Odisha and West Bengal. These paintings are depicted with sharp, angular bold lines depict epics, Gods and Goddesses.

The name Pattachitra has evolved from the Sanskrit words patta, meaning canvas, and chitra, meaning picture.

Pattachitra is thus a painting done on canvas, and is manifested by rich colourful application, creative motifs and designs, and portrayal of simple themes, mostly mythological in depiction.
